ComicInfo.Penciller: Patrick McEown,Roberta Gregory,Pat McEown,Dave Cooper,Steven Weissman,Pat McEown,Dave Cooper,Roberta Gregory,Steven Weissman
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dave Cooper (Suckle) looks at a friendship in disrepair in the third "Dan & Larry."
"Mary Walker, The Woman" is the story of a courageous soldier who fights impossible odds, and it comes courtesy of Doug Murray (The 'Nam) and Roberta Gregory (Naughty Bits). Also, Steven Weissman (Yikes!) contributes another audacious adventure of Phineas Page, the Bookshelf Phantom.
ComicInfo.Title: Wanted Man; Yellow Cement; Mary Walker: The Woman; Justine vs The Bookshelf Phantom
